entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as having a worst memory. The text does not provide further information about his past.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is mentioned as being in Dumbledore's job for the first day. Snape wonders how she is feeling about it.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as someone who will react to the news that the school had spent most of the day in a state of advanced disruption.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as speeding away from fireworks. He also falls into a corridor leading to the Department of Mysteries.

relationships.description: Snape wonders how Umbridge is feeling about her first day in Dumbledore's job.
Snape wonders how Fudge will react when he hears that the school had spent most of the day in a state of advanced disruption.
